resources.string: The alarm has been cancelled by the sender
Please restart the app with internet available in order to register properly to the Service.
The user didn\'t specify a personal message
Somebody near to you needs help!
In order for our app to work, you need to enable location services in the settings

You can enable or dissable to two means of comunication. The Server Connection only works if there\'s an active internet connection available (charges may apply). The p2p connection also works without an active internet connection but may influence your battery usage. Please make sure at least one is enabled, otherwise you won\'t be able to receive emergency messages from other people.
